duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in the calibration of sampling/monitoring equipment, soil sampling, well installation, and groundwater sampling.
Prepare and review data tables, soil boring logs, and technical reports.
Work predominantly in the field, conducting sample collection, recording of operational parameters, and oversight of subcontractors.
Physically move around outdoors in various terrains, in adverse weather conditions, and occasionally for extended hours.
Use of hand-held monitoring instruments and tools, as well as water sampling equipment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in relevant technical field (Master's preferred)
